text.jpText:
ウマ娘ならば誰もが憧れる三冠レース。
『菊花賞』……その当日。
text.enText:
The Triple Crown race that every Uma Musume yearns for. The 
"Kikka-sho" ...... is the day of the race.

text.jpText:
盛り上がりを見せるレース場では
メジロマックイーンとメジロライアンによる
『メジロ家』対決に注目が集まっていた。
text.enText:
The racecourse was abuzz with excitement, and all eyes were on 
the "Mejiro Family" showdown between the Mejiro McQueen and 
Mejiro Ryan. The "Mejiro Family" showdown between the Mejiro 
McQueen and the Mejiro Ryan attracted a lot of attention.

text.jpText:
そんな中、メジロマックイーンは、
メジロライアンとの真剣勝負へ……
堂々とした態度で挑んでいくのだった。
text.enText:
In the midst of all this, White-Tailed McQueen went into a 
serious battle ...... with White-Tailed Ryan. He took on the 
challenge with an imposing attitude.
